root.name: EverQuest II: Age of Discovery
root.description: First announced at SOE's Fan Faire 2011, Age of Discovery is the eighth expansion for EverQuest II, following Destiny of Velious. It was released on December 6th, 2011, alongside the merger of EQ2 Extended and EQ2 Live, which made all EQ2 servers free to play.FeaturesThe Beastlord class is being added as the 25th class.Mercenaries (NPC party members)Player-created dungeonsTradeskill apprentices (NPC tradeskillers)Increased AA capNew 'reforging' system to allow players to change stats on itemsRebuilding of Freeport into a single zone, adding new quests across the entire level rangeA new public quest in the Commonlands
